sentences.en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
sentences.cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

sentences.en: "His memory must be completely back, then?" — "Just about."
sentences.cn: “这么说，他的记忆一定是完全恢复了？”——“差不多。”

sentences.en: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.cn: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.en: A nice hot bath – just the thing(= exactly the right thing ) to relax sore muscles.
sentences.cn: 洗个舒服的热水澡，那正是缓解肌肉酸痛的好方法。

sentences.en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentences.cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentences.en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentences.en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentences.cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

sentences.en: How do we know you're not just covering up for your friend?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么知道你不只是在为自己的朋友遮掩呢？

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I’ve just been out shopping.
sentences.cn: 我刚才出去买东西了。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: It was just an ordinary voice, but he sang in tune.
sentences.cn: 他声音很一般，但唱得都在调子上。

sentences.en: it was just as well I didn't know at the time.
sentences.cn: 幸好当时我不知道。

sentences.en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentences.cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentences.en: it was just on midnight.
sentences.cn: 刚好是午夜。

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.cn: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.en: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.cn: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: Just what do you think you’re trying to do?
sentences.cn: 你究竟想干什么？

sentences.en: polishing the furniture and making everything just so.
sentences.cn: 油漆家具并把一切都收拾的井井有条。

sentences.en: She looks just like her mother.
sentences.cn: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.en: She loved it, this was just up her street.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢这个，这正中她的意。

sentences.en: So, if we could just move onto something else?
sentences.cn: 那么我们可不可以干脆谈点别的？

sentences.en: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.cn: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.en: The President's unescorted vehicle was ambushed just outside the capital.
sentences.cn: 刚出首都，总统无人护卫的汽车就遭到了伏击。

sentences.en: This job is just about done.
sentences.cn: 这件工作差不多做完了
